subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Svetlana Kuznetsova, Martina Hingis and Lleyton Hewitt easily advanced to the second round on Tuesday. Third-seeded Novak Djokovic and sixth-seeded James Blake also advanced.
snippet: Svetlana Kuznetsova, Martina Hingis and Lleyton Hewitt easily advanced to the second round on Tuesday. Third-seeded Novak Djokovic and sixth-seeded James Blake also advanced.
